external_references.description: MSTIC, DART, M365 Defender. (2022, March 24). DEV-0537 Criminal Actor Targeting Organizations for Data Exfiltration and Destruction. Retrieved May 17, 2022.

objects.description: [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) has recruited target organization employees or contractors who provide credentials and approve an associated MFA prompt, or install remote management software onto a corporate workstation, allowing [LAPSUS$](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1004) to take control of an authenticated system.(Citation: MSTIC DEV-0537 Mar 2022)
